name: Buckazoids
description: The $Buckazoids memecoin project is about the recent discovery of the $BTC symbol on a videogame currency: $BUCKAZOIDS, from the year 1991, game called: Space Quest. This is a memecoin rallying behind the lore and the speculation of the bitcoin origins, and their founders. This Solana memecoin has no utility or any intrinsic value. Meant for entertainment purposes only. A community has since then adopted $BUCKAZOIDS, CTO operations have ensued.
